acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused persons are produced from the jail jazot and they are again remanded till next date. Accused Bulbul Hussain has expressed that he is not in a position to engage any laywer to defend him hence Mr. Jitu Paul a panel lawyer of DLSA is hereby appointed as a legal aid counsel to defend the aforesaid accused person. Inform all concerned accordingly. Copy is furnished to the accused persons.      Having very carefully gone through the submissions duly advanced by the learned lawyers of both sides as well as case diary I find that there is a ground for presuming that the accused Bulbul Hussain Committed offence  under section 363 of the IPC/Section 6 of the POCSO Act and that accused Mirajul Islam committed offence under section 363 of the IPC/17 of the POCSO Act R/W section 6 of the POCSO Act. Accordingly charges are framed. The particular of the offences charged is duly read over to them to which they pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issue summons to PWs. Fixing 19-12-2019 for Production/Evidence

Court work is disrupted due to agitation.    Accused Bulbul Hussain and Mirajul Islam are produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.     PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not yet returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.      Fixing 02.01.20 for Production  Evidence
Accused are produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PWs absent. Summon not returned. Issue fresh
Accused are  produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date.PWs absent. summon not returned. Issue fresh

Case record is received from Honble Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.    Accused person namely Bulbul Hussain and Mirajul Islam are produced from Jail Hazot. They are again remanded to Jail Hazot till next date.    PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.

accd Bulbul Hussain and Mirajul Islam are produced from jail hazot, they are again remanded to jail hazot till next date,        no PWs turned up.       Issue fresh summons to PWS.        seen ptn no. 208/20 dtd 07-2-2020filed by Md Innus Ali praying for allowing accd Mirajul Islam to go on bail, the ptn is supported by an affidavit.        perused the CR.        CR reveals that the accd Mirajul Islam has been languishing in jail hazot since 02-9-2019. Charges were framed against the accd on 06-12-2019, since then for the last four dates the prosecution has not been able to procure the attendance of any witness,  Considering all, the bail prayer is allowed,         Accordingly, accd Mirajul Islam is allowed to go on bail of Rs 20,000/- with one local surety of like amount with a condition that he shall appear before this court on each and every dates fixed by this court.
accd Bulbul Hussain produced from jail hazot and remanded till next date.        co-accd Mirajul Islam present..        pws absent, summons issued to PWs not returned, issue fresh summons .
accd mirajul Islam and Bulbul Hussain present,    PWS absent, summons issued to PWS not returned, issue fresh summons to PWS.
court works are disrupted due to COVID 19,for PWs
